confirm.question: Do you really want to carry out and finally save this pre-stored creation?

confirm.title: Confirm creation!

delete.question: Do you really want to carry out and finally save this pre-stored creation?
delete.text: After saving, the record can no longer be changed or deleted. Please check carefully that everything is correct.
delete.title: Delete creation!

deny.text: After saving, the record can no longer be changed or deleted. Please check carefully that everything is correct.
deny.title: Reject creation!

removeNotSelf: As an admin/moderator, you cannot delete yourself.
